fields.description:
In order to aid in integration with the new methods for authentication in use by appcelerator CLI, some changes need to be made to the analytics and authentication in the Titanium CLI.

1) Pass token (process environment) to Titanium
2) Select a fixed User ID for PEM to handle analytics
3) Pass a new endpoint to return S3 bucket URL for future modification to registry URL
4) Stub login logout and make these no ops
fields.summary: CLI: Modify authentication and analytics in Titanium CLI

comments.body:
node-appc v0.2.26 PR https://github.com/appcelerator/node-appc/pull/108 - Fixes #2

Titanium CLI master PR https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium/pull/204 - Fixes #1, #2, #3

Backend server is here and published to both production and preproduction:

https://github.com/appcelerator/appc-mobilesdk-server

Still need to validate token and create AWS one-time urls.
